name: Cloyster
description: The Bivalve Pokémon. For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamond shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Skill Link
abilities.description: Combo moves that have the ability to hit more than once, after the same attack roll, are guaranteed to hit at least twice. (Fury Swipes, Double Slap, Water Shuriken, etc.)

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.
